title: 1BR apt, Minutes to Light Rail, Modern kitchen **Below Market Rental**
posting_body: With 10-foot ceilings and much of the original woodwork and trim, each New Century Commons apartment home is different and special.
Your apartment may have the original built-in china cabinets with glass doors, a large bay window, or large cheerful skylights.
Every kitchen is totally modern, with dishwasher and built-in microwave oven.
Located in Historic Downtown San Jose area
Contact us today to schedule a tour!
Contact us to schedule a tour
Photos in ad may not be of actual apartment, however we try our best to use photos similar to the floor plan.
